Time
August 7 · 1:00pm - 4:00pm
Location Norwalk Town Hall
Created By
Robert Willis

JOIN MULTIPLE TEA PARTY GROUPS TO RALLY AND DRAW ATTENTION THE THE PRIMARY THAT TUESDAY, AUG 10TH !

Same location as last time in Norwalk! Please invite all of your friends, the last event here had over 200 people!

Media outlets will be there, lets make this a big event to draw attention to the primary that Tuesday!
Let's have 1000+ we can do it!
